Dear Heritrix users,

I am a librarian in HKUST library and I just try to use Heritrix as
the web crawler. I have one question.

How can I set up so that all the absolute links in the target website
will become relative ones in the downloaded version?

e.g. 1

Change: absolute URL

  href="http://www.yahoo.com/mytopic/test1.html"

To: relative URL (

  href="mytopic/test1.html"

e.g. 2

Change: absolute URL

  href="/mytopic/test2.html"

To: relative URL (

  href="mytopic/test2.html"

Since I want to put the downloaded website into a CDROM, so all the
links must be relative so that they won't point 'outside' the CDROM
and stay within the CDROM.

Your ideas and suggestions are important because I don't know where to
start with!

Thanks a lot!

Alan Ng
HKUST Library
May 11
